items.title: Can McDonald’s Corporation (MCD) Keep Serving Up Dividend Growth?
items.description: McDonald’s Corporation (NYSE:MCD) is included among the 10 Best Passive Income Stocks to Buy Now. The company currently offers a quarterly dividend of $1.77 per share and has a dividend yield of 2.36%, as of July 10. items.title: Truist Increases PT on Bank of America to $53, Maintains Buy Rating On the Stock
items.description: Bank of America Corporation (NYSE:BAC) is one of the 12 Best Stocks to Invest in for Good Returns. items.title: 5 Most Valuable ‘Error Coins’ Ever Minted — Look for These Misprints

items.title: DNUT DEADLINE TUESDAY: ROSEN, RECOGNIZED INVESTOR COUNSEL, Encourages Krispy Kreme, Inc. Investors with Losses in Excess of $100K to Secure Counsel Before Important July 15 Deadline in Securities Class Action – DNUT
items.author: Rosen Law Firm
items.description: Rosen Law Firm is notifying Krispy Kreme investors who purchased securities between February 25 and May 7, 2025, about a potential class action lawsuit regarding misleading statements about McDonald's partnership performance.

insights.sentiment_reasoning: The lawsuit alleges the company made false statements about product demand at McDonald's locations, declining sales, and partnership profitability, suggesting potential misrepresentation of business performance
Mentioned as a partnership context but not directly implicated in the lawsuit's allegations
